Dialogue.Page: If someone, uh, reads this, Hello! If you are looking after me, go to the Moon thats orbiting the Ringed Planet
wait, that's stupid, This is GOING to orbit the damn thing!
well, i don't have an Eraser, so now it's going to stay there, great...
(Also, i made this. it's a home made satalite, judge me all you want! i don't care!)
